Text: wellI cant imagine the volume of fan mail on your exit so Ill be brief Just returned from an unplugged vacation to read the surprisingintriguing news comments The Times tells me youre engaged A thousand blessings on your heads I always wished I were Jewish but couldnt qualify on taste or IQ Ive told people that you are my business hero for several years now It seems a little unfair that you would now vie for the personal life hero as well so Ill hold that title in abeyance for the moment It goes without saying that if there were ever any way to work together the firm not that firm and I would be honored On the trip back Ive been reading Katharine Grahams autobiography Apparently she slept a lot with Adlai Stevenson another wicked smart guy His most widely used quote at retirement Id just like to lie under a tree with a glass of wine and watch people dance They say he was too smart to be President All the best jt John Thornton General Partner Austin Ventures
